mapper.select: SELECT share_id,a.user_id,user_name,a.account_id,share_content,share_image,share_state,share_video,wb_id,account_avatar,avatar_hd,a.add_time, share_coin,share_num,have_shared_num,total_coin,is_original,share_num_true,share_status,share_type,json,background_image FROM g_share a RIGHT JOIN g_user_account b ON a.`account_id` = b.account_id WHERE a.share_state = 0 AND a.share_status = 1

SELECT share_id,a.user_id,user_name,a.account_id,share_content,share_image,share_state,share_video,wb_id,account_avatar,avatar_hd,a.add_time, share_coin,share_num,have_shared_num,total_coin,is_original,share_num_true,share_status,share_type,json,background_image FROM g_share a RIGHT JOIN g_user_account b ON a.`account_id` = b.account_id WHERE a.share_state in (0,2,3) AND a.share_status = 1 order by a.share_id desc

SELECT share_id,a.user_id,user_name,a.account_id,share_content,share_image,share_state,share_video,wb_id,account_avatar,avatar_hd,a.add_time, share_coin,share_num,have_shared_num,total_coin,is_original,share_num_true,share_status,share_type,json,background_image FROM g_share a RIGHT JOIN g_user_account b ON a.`account_id` = b.account_id WHERE a.share_state = 0 AND a.share_recommend = 1
